content.question: Substance Approximate <math alttext="S naught joules per mole, kelvin" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mi>S</mi> <mi>°</mi> <mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"> </mspace> <mtext>(J/(mol</mtext> <mo>⋅</mo> <mtext>K))</mtext> </mrow> </mstyle> </math> <math alttext="C solid" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>C</mtext><mo>(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 6 <math alttext="C O gas" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 198 <math alttext="C O 2 gas" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 214 <math alttext="C H 4 gas" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>CH</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 186 <math alttext="C 2 H 6 gas" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 229 <math alttext="H 2 gas" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 131 <math alttext="O 2 gas" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 205 The table above provides approximate <math alttext="S naught" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>S</mi><mi>°</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> values for several substances. Based on the information, which of the following reactions has the largest increase in entropy, <math alttext="delta S naught" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>S</mi><mi>°</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="2 C solid plus O 2 gas react to produce 2 C O gas" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>C(</mtext><mi>s</mi><mtext>)</mtext><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>(</mtext><mi>g</mi><mtext>)</mtext><mo>→</mo><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>CO(</mtext><mi>g</mi><mtext>)</mtext></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="C solid plus O 2 gas react to produce C O 2 gas" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mtext>C(</mtext><mi>s</mi><mtext>)</mtext><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>(</mtext><mi>g</mi><mtext>)</mtext><mo>→</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>(</mtext><mi>g</mi><mtext>)</mtext></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="C solid plus 2 H 2 gas react to produce C H 4 gas" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mtext>C(</mtext><mi>s</mi><mtext>)</mtext><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>(</mtext><mi>g</mi><mtext>)</mtext><mo>→</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>CH</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>(</mtext><mi>g</mi><mtext>)</mtext></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="2 C solid plus 3 H 2 gas react to produce C 2 H 6 gas" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>C(</mtext><mi>s</mi><mtext>)</mtext><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>(</mtext><mi>g</mi><mtext>)</mtext><mo>→</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>(</mtext><mi>g</mi><mtext>)</mtext></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="2 C solid plus O 2 gas react to produce 2 C O gas" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>C(</mtext><mi>s</mi><mtext>)</mtext><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>(</mtext><mi>g</mi><mtext>)</mtext><mo>→</mo><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>CO(</mtext><mi>g</mi><mtext>)</mtext></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
